name: The Realm Walker Beta
description:
The Realm Walker is a medieval fantasy RPG Maker game that I've been working on for over two-and-a-half years. Set in the fictional world of Kinsreth, the story centers around a sorceress from the capital, one who wields a power that no other summoner has ever possessed. While the nature of her power is kept highly confidential, all know that it is sought after by every major ruler across the land. You play as a small-town warrior appointed to escort the sorceress, as she sets out on a diplomatic quest to convene with  leaders of a frail global alliance.

Between cut-scenes, The Realm Walker features a free-roam gameplay style. In addition to a turn-based battle system, game mechanics include a time/random weather cycle, farming, enchanting, alchemy, ability/stat unlocking, fishing, horse riding, harnessing/recruiting enemies defeated in battle, and more. The beta  contains about a dozen hours of gameplay.
